DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess Safety , Tolerability Efficacy ZD6126 Combination Oxaliplatin , 5-Fluorouracil Leucovorin Subjects Metastatic Colorectal Cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability Efficacy ZD6126 Combination With Oxaliplatin , 5-Fluorouracil Leucovorin Subjects With Metastatic Colorectal Cancer .
DOC.criteria: Metastatic colorectal carcinoma Suitable firstline treatment metastatic disease Peripheral neuropathy great Grade 1 Adjuvant therapy within 6 month prior study treatment Prior oxaliplatin Prior pelvic whole abdomen radiation Any history coronary angioplasty history myocardial infarction
